title: "Navy Program Will Use AI on Drone Images to Predict Fleet Maintenance Needs"
excerpt: "The Navy has been using drones to inspect the maintenance needs of its fleet and is getting ready to add some artificial intelligence and machine learning in the mix to help it prioritize repairs and predict future needs."
